content.question: Cart <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="2 m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving with velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right on a horizontal frictionless track, as shown above, when it collides with cart <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. choices.label: Cart <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving to the left, and cart <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving to the right.

content.answer: Both carts move to the right, but they are not stuck together.
